name: Velia
description:
When Velia wakes up to hear a crash in the middle of the night, she leaps into action curious about what she may find. What she finds will change her world forever.

•Explore the fallen laboratory of Doctor Scaffolus and fight creatures beyond comprehension.

• Dig up and navigate through the laboratory's 7 bizarre stages.

• And defeat 8 menacing bosses.

For any issues or comment please contact at

velia@shademare.com
